p: Accordingly, to obtain a detailed insight on the efficacy of 2j, 2l, and 2n against HTNV, a yield reduction assay was performed. The reduction of virus titer in the presence of the active compound during a single round of viral infection was determined. Treatment with non-cytotoxic 20 µM concentration of 2j, 2l and 2n caused a significant reduction of viral titer ( Figure 5). A significant decline in viral titer of HTNV was also observed at 50 µM treatment of RBV (* p-value <0.05, unpaired t-test).
